interlinear-text.item: I sacrifice myself for my flower 3

phrase.item: My darling is on the roof, when she saw me she hid herself.
My heart broke, I sacrifice myself for my darling.
On your house there is imik [a kind of herb], you [with] black face and gold teeth, I could not sleep at night, I would sacrifice myself for you.
I directed the water toward the high water channel, I remembered [my] sweetheart.
Half of my life is wasted, I would sacrifice myself for your name.
The beans were watered, Nuqra came out from the house.
Come, let's go to the house.
I sacrifice myself for your name.
Me and my darling are in Tsir, the road ahead is so far.
We have [only] two cheeses for food, I sacrifice myself for your name.
